extends gate.corpora.DocumentImpl
implements CompositeDocument, gate.event.AnnotationSetListener, gate.event.DocumentListener, gate.event.AnnotationListener, gate.event.FeatureMapListener
    Implementation of the Composite Document.
    Author:
    niraj

      protected Set<String> combinedDocumentIds
      Set of ids of combined documents.

      CombiningMethod that was used for creating this document.
      protected CompoundDocument compoundDocument
      The compound document which the current composite document belongs to.
      protected boolean disableListener
      When a new annotation is added to the composite document, this parameter tells whether the annotation copying and deletion to their respective documents should be carried out or not.
      protected HashMap<String,List<OffsetDetails>> offsetMappings
      A Map that contains offet mappings.

    • Field Detail

      • combiningMethod

        protected CombiningMethod combiningMethod
        CombiningMethod that was used for creating this document.

      • offsetMappings

        protected HashMap<String,List<OffsetDetails>> offsetMappings
        A Map that contains offet mappings. This is used for copying and removing annotations to the respective documents.

      • combinedDocumentIds

        protected Set<String> combinedDocumentIds
        Set of ids of combined documents.

      • compoundDocument

        protected CompoundDocument compoundDocument
        The compound document which the current composite document belongs to.

      • disableListener

        protected boolean disableListener
        When a new annotation is added to the composite document, this parameter tells whether the annotation copying and deletion to their respective documents should be carried out or not.
